answers.answer: Yes if you feel that worried about it. I've never had that happen to me although I have nearly passed out in my first trimester.  I think it ha something to do with extra blood and your blood pressure. Go get checked out as relieve your mind :D
Im barley 11 wks & 5 days and I went to the nutritionist like a day before this happened and everything looked good but the bam that happened . .

I had this with all 3 of my pregnancies and it is either low blood pressure or gestational diabetes. I would call your dr and let them know what happened. I am sure they will want to check your bp. Your gestational diabetes screen doesn't happen until about 26 weeks.Make you drink plenty of water, and try to stay away from sugary foods. Even when you go to walmart, bring a snack with you.  Granola bar, crackers, something healthy that you can put in your stomach.

question: I was at walmart doing grocery shopping and it was like thirty mins. And the it came to check out and I just blanked out and felt so slow and weak, I couldn't hear no one and I felt as if I couldn't speak when I was! Should I go to the doctors or hospital?
title: should I go to the hospital
